title: Medical Billing
job_overview:
Job Title: Medical Biller (2+ Years Experience)
Location: [ "Remotely"]
Job Type: [Full-Time]


About Us:
We specialize in providing accurate, efficient, and compliant medical billing solutions to healthcare providers. We’re currently seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Medical Biller to join our team and help streamline revenue cycle operations for our growing client base.

Key Responsibilities:
Accurately process and submit claims to insurance companies (both electronic and paper).

Follow up on unpaid claims, denials, and rejections.

Verify patient insurance coverage and benefits.

Post payments and reconcile accounts.

Communicate with patients, providers, and insurance companies to resolve billing issues.

Maintain confidentiality and HIPAA compliance.

Assist with monthly reporting and audits as needed.

Requirements:
2+ years of experience in medical billing, preferably in a multi-specialty or high-volume setting.

Proficient in CPT, ICD-10, and HCPCS coding.

Experience with EHR/EMR systems 
Podiatry billing is a +

Strong knowledge of payer requirements and denial management.

Excellent communication and organizational skills.

High attention to detail and accuracy.

Knowledge of HIPAA and healthcare compliance regulations.

Experience with Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial payers.

Familiarity with AR follow-up and appeals process.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary ($ TBD depending on experience)

Remote work opportunity

How to Apply:
Please call me on whats app 415.407.9995 and send your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience to [Insert email or link]. We look forward to hearing from you!
